thread.title_full: Falz: Singer says he faced discrimination at Kenyan airport - Celebrities - Pulse

author: Omotolani Odumade
title: Falz: Singer says he faced discrimination at Kenyan airport - Celebrities - Pulse
text: ALSO READ: Falz is on that new wave and we have proof According to the 'Wehdone sir' singer, " I was on holiday recently. I was with my guys. We were at the airport about to get into Kenya. Kenya o! African country o! " he said painfully. Adding, " They sent us to go to the side with Nigerian people. They just kept on saying Cybercrime, Internet fraud. That's what we're known for. It was disgraceful, extremely shameful. "
